Text: Matt Khouries mother Lila Van Orden passed away on Friday September Memorial service will be held on Wednesday October at am at St Johns Episcopal Church Lagunitas Road Ross California For those who want to send flowers they need to arrive at the church by am on Wednesday In lieu of flowers the family has requested donations be made to the Multiple Sclerosis Society Grand Avenue Oakland CA in memory of Lila Van Orden Our thoughts and prayers are with Matt and his family Jeff Hildebrand Communications Chair
